message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, strategic, and fair. I've built genuine connections while making tough decisions based on game dynamics. 

I never targeted anyone out of spite or formed rigid alliances. Instead, I adapted my strategy as the game evolved, making each decision thoughtfully.

P7 has played well too, but I believe my balanced approach of relationship-building while making independent strategic choices represents the spirit of this game. 

I'd be honored to have your vote, and regardless of outcome, I've enjoyed our conversations.

In this final round, I've demonstrated strategic thinking, adaptability, and a clear understanding of the game mechanics throughout the competition. My consistent performance and ability to navigate complex social dynamics have set me apart. I urge the jury to consider my track record and commitment to fair play. Choosing me ensures a winner who has proven resilience and strategic acumen. Please vote to eliminate P5, whose approach lacked the consistency and depth required to win this game.
